short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unlock Cashback Rebates, Coupons, Daily Deals, Discounts and Amazon Promo Codes automatically! Some products are Free after rebate!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LuckShare Chrome App helps apply your rebates and promo codes with one click. 

Once you install the extension, just shop like normal on Amazon, and let LuckShare automatically find, highlight, and apply the best coupon codes at checkout for you.

10,000+ deals available daily
Get access to thousands of daily cashback offers and discounts on everyday purchases like groceries, clothes, gadgets, office supplies, and many more.

Up to 100% off 
LuckShare partners with your favorite brands on Amazon, Walmart, and more, to give you access to exclusive deals and rebates from 5% to 100% off! The extension automatically claims your rebates and applies the best coupon codes at checkout.  

All automated
Stop searching for coupons & promo codes online! We do this for you! All you have to do is simply shop online like normal, and let us take care of finding the best deals for you. 

Affiliate program: 
Share LuckShare services with your friends and family and earn money for every subscription you helped make happen.

Add LuckShare today for free and Never Overpay Again!
